candidates.name: Brian Hanna
candidates.why_elect: I have been running my own business for 34 years, am very engaged with the community, and believe I am very approachable. I am at ease in most company, and stand by my record of service as your Mayor over past nine years.
candidates.why_stand: Having served 3 terms as Mayor, I wish to continue to deliver positive, forward looking , passionate leadership as I have done in the past. I don't want to see the progress we have made be undone , we need consistency and stable leadership.

candidates.name: John Robertson
candidates.why_elect: I was raised in Waitomo, in Piopio. I know the area and in particular know the people. I have been a Mayor and MP in Papakura, and know what it takes to both represent and be a good representative of a community.
candidates.why_stand: The Waitomo District Council is financially troubled. It has very high rates and very high debt. Its governance also needs improving and it needs to become more transparent. As the former chair of Commissioners at the Kaipara District Council, I have the experience to address these matters.
